programme.title: Road Wars

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: A woman whips out a gun after an alleged road altercation in Apollo Beach, Florida; A man tries to evade police capture using a skateboard.

programme.title: Road Wars

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: A driver who is burning rubber in Times Square nearly runs over an NYPD officer. A sedan gets dragged for miles down a California highway after getting wedged underneath a tractor trailer.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: A truck driver hits a car in Michigan, a motorcycle group altercates with a pickup truck driver in Oklahoma, a speeding automobile misses an onramp on a Minnesota highway, and a police officer jumps the gun in Texas in response to an emergency call.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: In Canton, Ohio, a horn honk on the road allegedly leads to a man wreaking havoc on a woman's car; in Jonesboro, Ark., chaos ensues when a suspect manages to break free from his handcuffs and holds a lighter flame to the seat.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: Takes a deep dive into American roadways - the extreme human behavior, wild weather, insane accidents, and a few acts of kindness.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: Professional photographers become the victims of a broad daylight smash and grab in San Francisco. In San Diego, an enraged dog walker goes ballistic when she confronts a speeding driver in her neighborhood. A roadside altercation in Florida turns violent. A woman's car goes over a 20 foot embankment in Charlotte, North Carolina, landing directly on top of an SUV driving on the highway below. And a routine traffic stop in Denver, Colorado turns into two drivers' worst nightmare.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: A disagreement over driving rules in a Washington State parking lot ends with multiple gunshots. A confrontational driver pushes two friends to the brink. Things spin out of control when a driver pursues someone in an SUV who allegedly smashed her rear window. A man in Massachusetts rebuilds his truck, backwards.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: A motorcyclist in Colorado keeps his cool during a heated argument until the other driver touches his bike. A valet's joyride in Miami goes up in smoke. An erratic driver crashes their way down an interstate in New Jersey. A mother and her toddler are knocked off a motorbike into oncoming traffic in Vietnam.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: In Hawaii, an altercation between two motorists escalates after one of them appears to be holding a pocket knife. On a highway in Rawlins, Wyoming, a snowstorm turns a single accident into a pileup involving nearly 100 vehicles. In Livonia, Michigan, a woman is found asleep behind the wheel at a stop light. Traffic cameras in Iowa capture shocking video of a teen falling out of a vehicle on the highway. A bicycling event on a closed-off road in Portland Oregon takes a turn.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: In the U.K., two men get much more than they bargained for when the driver they confront takes them both down with ease. A Florida man leads police on a high speed chase when he steals two separate squad cars. An apparent street fight in Rochester, New York, leads to a terrifying head on collision for a rideshare driver and her passengers. A woman spots an erratic driver on a Tennessee highway. In Alberta, Canada, a pickup driver befriends a lost goose and leads it to the nearest lake.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: In California, a roadside fight results in an unconscious driver. In Baltimore, a stolen vehicle crashes into a building, causing collapse. In England, a driver faces unexpected reactions from a cut-off motorcyclist. In Minnesota, a stalled pickup truck causes a major accident. In New Jersey, a high-ranking government official argues with police officers at a traffic stop.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: A motorcyclist encounters a young driver whose car is on fire but who refuses to call authorities. A trucker in Georgia is involved in a tragic accident after his semi stops on the highway.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: In Queens, a car owner attempts to drive off a tow truck's boom. On Long Island, a large family brawl breaks out in the middle of the street after a major collision. In Oregon, the owner of a missing car tracks it to a nearby parking lot.

programme.title: Review
programme.desc: A review of a movie, or a restaurant, or a car?or whatever else that typically falls under a critic's domain?is all well and good, and can even be helpful at times. programme.desc: Después e la muerte de su esposo, una mujer se muda de Nueva Jersey a Los Ángeles para estar más cerca de su hija.

programme.desc: Una madre soltera emigra de México y se convierte en la empleada doméstica de un reconocido chef y de su neurótica esposa.

programme.desc: Una historia sobre la primera Liga Profesional de Béisbol Americano de Mujeres en 1943, y las mujeres que la formaron.

programme.title: Motorama
programme.desc: Un niño de 10 años roba un auto y atraviesa el país para ganar el concurso de colección de tarjetas de una gasolinera.

programme.title: Riding in Cars With Boys
programme.desc: Una adolescente lucha por hacer sus sueños realidad, pero debe lidiar con un embarazo no deseado y un matrimonio inestable.

programme.title: 50 First Dates

programme.title: Riding in Cars With Boys
programme.desc: Una adolescente lucha por hacer sus sueños realidad, pero debe lidiar con un embarazo no deseado y un matrimonio inestable.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: La historia de un juego mágico que libera una estampida de peligros de la selva contra sus jugadores y un hombre que desapareció en 1969 mientras jugaba.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: El detrás de las escenas de las películas de acción más importantes de Hollywood para ver los lugares de rodaje famosos y aprender cómo se crea la magia de las películas de acción.

programme.title: It Could Happen to You
programme.desc: Un policía enfrenta a su codiciosa esposa cuando cumple su palabra de compartir el premio de la lotería con una mesera.

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: Melvin Udall, un escritor obsesivo y maniático, es uno de los seres más desagradables que se puede tener como vecino. Pero, un buen día, tiene que hacerse cargo de un perro al que odia a muerte y su presencia le ablandará el corazón.

programme.title: Loser
programme.desc: Un universitario sufre acoso por parte de sus compañeros y en paralelo ama a una hermosa compañera que, lejos de corresponderle, está enamorada de un profesor.

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Corrupt cops working in the police department evidence room make plans to rob a vault full of drug money in the back of a convenience store.

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Climbers (Jason Clarke, Josh Brolin, John Hawkes) from two expeditions fight for survival during a fierce blizzard on Mount Everest.

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: As a planet hurtles toward a collision course with Earth, two sisters (Kirsten Dunst, Charlotte Gainsbourg) cope with the approaching doomsday in different ways.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: In 2028, a robotics company sees a chance to bring its technology to American law enforcement by transforming a critically injured police officer (Joel Kinnaman) into a cyborg.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: After his son is tricked into awakening a cursed Chinese emperor, Rick O'Connell (Brendan Fraser) and his family seek a way to send the megalomaniac and his 10,000 warriors back to their graves.

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: An outcast (Ethan Hawke) takes part in a complicated and perilous scheme to assume the identity of a genetically engineered citizen (Jude Law).

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: After meeting the gal (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) of his dreams, a charming slacker (Michael Cera) must contend with an army of her ex-boyfriends, wanting to get rid of him.

programme.title: Tim and Eric's Billion Dollar Movie
programme.desc: Would-be filmmakers Tim and Eric squander $1 billion of the sinister Schlaaang Corp.'s money and must figure out a way to pay it back.

programme.title: The Invention of Lying
programme.desc: In a world where falsehood is unknown, a luckless writer (Ricky Gervais) develops the ability to lie and uses his newfound skill for personal gain.

programme.title: Our Idiot Brother
programme.desc: Following his release from jail, a well-meaning but dimwitted slacker (Paul Rudd) wreaks havoc with his three sisters' carefully structured lives.

programme.title: I Am
programme.desc: Hairdresser Nicola is searching for her romantic ideal, but she's stuck in a coercive relationship with her partner Adam.

programme.title: Kiltro
programme.desc: The leader (Marko Zaror) of a Chilean gang uses martial arts to protect a girl (Caterina Jadresic) from a vengeful thug.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: An outrageous British woman (Renée Zellweger) decides to take control of her life, but instead falls for two very different men (Colin Firth, Hugh Grant).

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: An attractive lawyer and Bridget's (Renée Zellweger) former boss (Hugh Grant) threaten her newfound happiness with Mark Darcy (Colin Firth).

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: Befuddled mom-to-be Bridget Jones (Renée Zellweger) must figure out which of the two men (Colin Firth, Patrick Dempsey) in her life is the father of her child.

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: A working-class single mother (Jennifer Lawrence) builds a business dynasty while dealing with her dysfunctional parents and ex-husband (Edgar Ramírez).

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: A recent college graduate (Anne Hathaway) lands a job working for a famous and diabolical editor (Meryl Streep) of a New York fashion magazine.

programme.title: Black Swan
programme.desc: A ballerina (Natalie Portman) begins to lose her fragile grip on reality as a sultry newcomer (Mila Kunis) threatens to usurp her position as the lead dancer in "Swan Lake.".

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: In 1991, talented figure skater Tonya Harding becomes the first American woman to complete a triple axel during a competition. In 1994, her world comes crashing down when her ex-husband conspires to injure fellow Olympic hopeful Nancy Kerrigan.

programme.title: How I Live Now
programme.desc: As conflict in Europe escalates, an American teen (Saoirse Ronan) fights to survive in the English countryside.

programme.title: White Bird in a Blizzard
programme.desc: A teenager (Shailene Woodley) relishes her newfound freedom after her disturbed mother (Eva Green) vanishes, but the strange facts of the disappearance soon begin to haunt her.

programme.title: Down Terrace
programme.desc: The body count rises as father-and-son crime kingpins (Robert Hill, Robin Hill) try to discover the identity of a traitor in their midst.

programme.title: Hobo With a Shotgun
programme.desc: Hoping for heaven but finding an urban hell, a homeless man (Rutger Hauer) takes aim at a crime boss and the man's sadistic sons (Gregory Smith, Nick Bateman).

programme.title: The Painter and the Thief
programme.desc: Czech artist Barbora Kysilkova develops an unlikely friendship with the man who stole two of her paintings.

programme.title: The Roads Not Taken
programme.desc: A man's journey through New York City takes on a hallucinatory quality as he floats through alternate lives he could have lived, while his daughter wrestles with her own path as she considers her future.

programme.title: Criminal
programme.desc: Hoping to stop a diabolical plot, the CIA implants the memories and skills of a dead agent (Ryan Reynolds) into the mind of a dangerous convict (Kevin Costner).

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Accused of murder, a man (Justin Timberlake) must figure out how to bring down a system where time is money, enabling the wealthy to live forever, while the poor must beg for each minute of life.

programme.desc: A celebration of the ever increasing depravity of television in our society, it's a channel surfing adventure through the most utterly ridiculous spoofed television programming and commercials.

programme.title: Money Movers
programme.desc: Anchors Carl Quintanilla and Sara Eisen focus on what is moving the stock markets, the agenda for the business day, detailed data on individual stocks, sectors and the indices that investors and traders want.

programme.title: Halftime Report
programme.desc: "Halftime Report" is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage; host CNBC's Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: The Exchange
programme.desc: Anchor Kelly Evans reports on the most important stories to today's markets and investors; reporters provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch
programme.desc: Focusing on real-time market coverage, breaking news and up-to-the-instant stock moving information; delving into the economy, the markets, real estate, media and technology - any place where there's money to be made.

programme.title: Closing Bell
programme.desc: A guide through the most important hour of the Wall Street trading day, and taking a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what's driving them and how investors are reacting; coverage includes reports from the CME Group, NASDAQ and the NYSE.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: A look at after-hours moves, including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading; big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day.

programme.title: Sex and the City

She believes that Kevin was with another woman while Kevin thinks that Shateonna is the one that is cheating. Karamo unlocks both of their phones to get to the truth.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Kensi and Deeks go undercover at a decommissioned nuclear power plant to investigate the radiation poisoning of a gunnery sergeant who was moonlighting as a security guard at the facility.

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia.

programme.title: Ford v Ferrari (2019)
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Ferrari is an untouchable figure in racing. With Enzo Ferrari ardently chasing after excellence, the company is irrefutably the best there is. Once considered unique, similar underground cities have since been found, such as the Longyou Grottos discovered in Zhejiang Province, China, in 1992.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins

programme.title: Moonlight
programme.desc: A look at three defining chapters in the life of Chiron, a young black man growing up in Miami. His epic journey to manhood is guided by the kindness, support and love of the community that helps raise him.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships, including an abusive husband. With support from a singer and her stepdaughter, she ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: With his father (Will Smith) trapped in the wreckage of their spacecraft, a youth (Jaden Smith) treks across Earth's now-hostile terrain to recover their rescue beacon and signal for help.

programme.title: Another Earth
programme.desc: Following her release from prison, a morose young woman (Brit Marling) seeks out the man (William Mapother) whose life she shattered in a car accident several years earlier.

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: A mixed martial arts title bout is jeopardarized when the champion angers Lucas.

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: A botched museum heist delivers unexpected consequences; Lucas, Carrie and Job renew their partnership.

programme.title: American Renegades
programme.desc: On assignment in war-torn Europe, Navy SEALs discover gold at the bottom of a lake -- a fortune rumored to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. When the enemy detects the team, the SEALs are left with only 10 hours to recover the treasure.

programme.title: Love Beats Rhymes
programme.desc: A young woman dream of making it big in the world of hip hop, but her parents demand that she finish college. She dutifully agrees to complete her education, however her spoken word proves to have a powerful impact in the classroom.

programme.title: Homefront
programme.desc: A former DEA agent (Jason Statham) returns to action to save his daughter and his new town from a drug-dealing sociopath (James Franco).

programme.title: Machete
programme.desc: Framed for a covert assassination, a blade-wielding former Federale (Danny Trejo) carves a path of blood, bullets and broken hearts as he carries out a mission of revenge.

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: A high school student exploring her independence on homecoming night is disrupted by her older brother and the shadows of their past.

programme.title: The Lodge
programme.desc: During a family retreat to a remote winter cabin, a man leaves his two children in the care of his new girlfriend, Grace. Isolated and alone, a blizzard traps them inside the lodge as terrifying events summon specters from Grace's dark past.

programme.title: The Wrecking Crew
programme.desc: The son of guitarist Tommy Tedesco pays tribute to his late father and a core group of studio musicians who played on some of the biggest hits of the 1960s and '70s, including "California Girls" and "Mrs. Robinson.".

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Teddy bear Ted (Seth MacFarlane) seeks legal help from a young lawyer (Amanda Seyfried) and a legendary, civil-rights attorney (Morgan Freeman) when the law declares him to be property and not a person.

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: In Hawaii struggling to get over a bad breakup, a musician (Jason Segel) encounters his former lover and her new boyfriend.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: A recently divorced woman (Amy Poehler) and her hotheaded sister (Tina Fey) throw a party that spirals out of control at their childhood home.

programme.title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
programme.desc: Following a long prison term for insider trading, master manipulator Gordon Gekko (Michael Douglas) keeps his real motives hidden when he forges an alliance with his daughter's fiancé (Shia LaBeouf).

Adam Lerner has always tried to take good care of his health, so it comes as a cruel surprise when he learns that he has malignant tumors along his spine; his doctor gives him a 50/50 chance of survival.

programme.title: The Extra Man
programme.desc: A flamboyant literature professor (Kevin Kline), who escorts rich old women on the side, teaches his cross-dressing roommate (Paul Dano) his unique perspective on life.

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Marauding bikers crash the annual Banshee Spirit Festival; Rebecca Bowman finds a kindred spirit in the sheriff.

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: A man from Lucas' past resurfaces and sets off a series of brutal prison memories; Proctor resorts to extortion.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: As sorority sisters prepare for holiday parties, a mysterious cloaked figure starts to leave a bloody trail throughout their campus. Refusing to become victims, the girls decide to band together and fight back against the psychotic Christmas killer.

programme.title: The Blackcoat's Daughter
programme.desc: During the dead of winter, a troubled young woman (Emma Roberts) embarks on a mysterious journey to an isolated prep school where two stranded students (Kiernan Shipka, Lucy Boynton) face a sinister threat from an unseen evil force.

programme.title: Ismael's Ghosts
programme.desc: Twenty-one years ago, she ran away -- and 21 years later, Carlotta is back from the void. But Ismael has been busy rebuilding a life for himself with Sylvia and working on his next movie -- the trials of an idle, funny and reckless diplomat.

programme.title: D...: The Musical
programme.desc: Two self-obsessed businessmen discover they're long-lost identical twins and come together to plot the reunion of their divorced parents.

programme.title: O
programme.desc: Jealous of his popularity, a teenager (Josh Hartnett) at a private school hatches a scheme to ruin his basketball teammate's (Mekhi Phifer) life.

programme.title: Local Programming
programme.desc: Sign off.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Hoping to meet her real father and have him walk her down the aisle, a bride secretly invites three men from her mother's (Meryl Streep) past to come to the wedding.

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: A recent college graduate (Anne Hathaway) lands a job working for a famous and diabolical editor (Meryl Streep) of a New York fashion magazine.

programme.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
programme.desc: The unusual genetic makeup of a librarian (Eric Bana) causes him to travel back and forth through time, so that he and his beloved (Rachel McAdams) are always out of sync.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Joe and the team continue transforming the '70s step van into a rolling billboard for a whiskey company; the body gets an extreme makeover; Joe works on the van's artwork; a local customer stops by for some help on his 1950 Chevy pickup truck.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: There's a change of plans for the Whiskey Van; the owner wants to auction the van off at Mecum and donate the proceeds to St. Jude's Children's Hospital; Joe and Mandi are excited by the idea, but only have five months to finish the van for auction.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: A couple travels from Missouri with a 1936 Ford Coupe that's been part of their family for a decade; it needs a new frame, motor and lots of repairs; Mandi and Shag get their hands on a 1960 Impala they want to flip for a quick profit.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Joe and Bryan work on the '36 Ford Coupe; with new wheels, lift-off hood and custom interior, the owner has waited decades to drive her family's heirloom, and the time is finally here; a couple returns with a '67 Chevelle to add even more horsepower.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Facing deadline, the shop struggles to fit a gigantic ex-NFL player into a tiny 1967 Chevy C10 that includes a customized leather interior and automated bed cover.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Joe is pushing his engineering chops to the limit by building a monster trike that would look right at home on the set of a "Mad Max" movie.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Shag and Amanda get a '65 Chevy II Nova for a steal, but as the team digs in, rat nests and rust are the least of their worries; the build requires a complete overhaul and has them thinking they bit off more than they can chew.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Fitment issues in the engine bay leave the entire shop scratching their heads; Joe has big plans for the '65 Nova, but a small space to work with.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: A customer wants to surprise his wife with major upgrades to her '68 Corvette convertible, but working with the fiberglass body soon brings on headaches that threaten both the car and the shop to crack under the pressure.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: The clock is ticking to complete a 1968 Corvette convertible, but messy fiberglass repairs uncover major collision damage; and if that wasn't enough, the customer also wants an all-white interior, which isn't a good fit for such a dirty job.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: A time capsule rolls into the shop in the form of a 1983 Silverado with exactly 69.2 miles on it; the owner recently passed away, and his daughter wants to finish turning his truck into a modern muscle car under the hood.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Amanda and Shag stumble upon a '73 Vega with a rich history and a seller anxious to see his car restored to glory; they plan to chop the top and add a enormous engine, but first they must tackle over 40 years of rust and grime.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Joe Martin brings new life to old iron at his shop Joe Martin Customs; working with his wife Amanda, and best friend Shag, this custom shop oversees every phase of restoration from design, fabrication and mechanicals, to the final paint job.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: A time capsule rolls into the shop in the form of a 1983 Silverado with exactly 69.2 miles on it; the owner recently passed away, and his daughter wants to finish turning his truck into a modern muscle car under the hood.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike hopes to capitalize on 1980s nostalgia by restoring an original six-cylinder 1982 Toyota Supra with a tired interior, faulty head gasket, compromised exhaust system, and only one working pop-up headlight.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: The problematic pig of a '73 El Camino named El Cochino is back; Freiburger and Dulcich address the camshaft and lifter issues that remain on their factory SS 454 four-speed Chevy, while also attempting to repair a terrible wheel-hop issue.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: Freiburger and Dulcich rescue Dirthead Dave's 1974 Chevy K20 long-bed from storage and give it a full Freiburger makeover; with a little maintenance, a few fixes and a whole new at-home paint job, the guys see if this truck is worth keeping around.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: KevDogg and Dave take the rig to the Triple Crown of Rodding show in Nashville; this is one of the few shows they've attended in the South, and they are chomping at the bit to check out all of the local builders, and get into some shenanigans.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A week in the life of a shop like Kindig-It Design is a mix of beauty and chaos; a look at one week includes multiple stories of what actually happens behind the scenes of the show, along with all the projects underway that week.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The shop gears up for the annual SEMA Show in Las Vegas; this year Dave brings seven cars; once the cars are readied, placed in their booths, and the show is running, the guys get a chance to check out some of the new builds at the show.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A '55 Bel Air that sat unused for over 10 years arrives to get off the lift and back on the road; a unicorn project arrives in the form of a 2002 Ferrari 360 Spider in need of a new canvas top.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: From the outside, a '57 Bel-Air has all the markings of a classic, but a closer inspection reveals rust in the rockers, sloppy gaps and damaged trim; while fixing up the obvious, the customer also wants a bigger engine.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave tries to come up with a one-of-a-kind color that incorporates the client request to get purple into the build; body work, assembly and some nifty mechanical work get this car in great condition, but the interior needs a complete overhaul.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Of all the different years and generations of the VW Bug, there is one that stands out among the rest -- the Hebmüller; there are maybe 200 of them left, so in addition to being hard to find, they are truly the holy grail of VWs.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The build continues, and the challenge is to keep what makes the car a Hebmueller intact, while taking bold steps to turn it into a hot rod. Dave keeps the traditional two-tone exterior, but modifying it to an automatic is a huge test for the shop.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Normally when Kindig-It Design attends a car show, their cars are the ones being judged. But this time around, Dave and Kev hold the keys and will have to select the top 10 builders out of the hundreds of cars that arrive for the show.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave's clients have owned a car since they got married 25 years ago and want it restored so they can enjoy it for another 25. While the shop isn't really into straight restorations, adding some custom pieces and paint makes them "say yes" to the pro.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave is thrilled with the latest build, while KevDogg is barely lukewarm; Dave has done double-cab VWs, Bugs and Karmann Ghias, but now he is taking on something completely different, and even more rare.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Matching the two-tone paint job is the challenge of the day as the '53 Barn Door Deluxe build carries on; custom trim, a new, more powerful engine, 22 windows and a custom interior all come together to make this surprise worth the wait.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave and the guys at Kindig-It proved they could execute Dave's vision of his production Corvette, but now that a few have sold, they have to get them completely finished.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave and the team put the finishing touches on the first-ever Kindig CF Corvettes to complete a lifelong dream; however, the clients argue about who will get the first one, all in advance of a once-in-a-lifetime debut at SEMA.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave and Kevin, who have been an absolute treat for automotive enthusiasts for years, come back to the SEMA show with something special on their minds.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike dives into the expanding market for second-generation muscle cars by snatching up a 1973 Ford Mustang Mach 1 that has lost some power over the years.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: Freiburger and Dulcich rescue a flat-fender 1952 Jeep with a small-block Chevy.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: Freiburger and Dulcich take the '56 Chevy Field Car, Bang-Shifting Cougar, and '31 Model A Ford "F-Rod" to test at the dragstrip.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: In the first episode of the series, Derek extracts a 1967 Ford Mustang that has sat dormant for 28 years. But the years of rust and neglect won't stop him from transforming this car into a new creation.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek decides to breathe new life into a 1951 Chevy Deluxe that has been out of action for decades. He must be prepared to put in more than the usual time and effort to succeed.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek saves a 1966 Pontiac Tempest with a rare overhead-camshaft six-cylinder engine; just dusting off cobwebs won't do this car justice; Dan the Interior Man works his magic on the upholstery; Derek sets to work.

programme.title: 88 Minutes
programme.desc: A forensic psychiatrist (Al Pacino) must use all his skills and training to find the person who issued an ominous death threat.

programme.title: Shadow Dancer
programme.desc: Arrested after a failed bombing attempt, a single mother and IRA member (Andrea Riseborough) falls into the hands of a British agent (Clive Owen) who offers her a choice: Spy on her IRA comrades, or spend a long prison term away from her young son.

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Lawmen James Payton (Ice Cube) and Ben Barber (Kevin Hart) pursue a violent drug lord (Benjamin Bratt) in Miami.

programme.title: Destroy All Monsters!
programme.desc: Scientists (Jun Tazaki, Yoshio Tsuchiya) face Godzilla, Rodan, Mothra and more obscure Japanese monsters sent by she-aliens.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Megalon
programme.desc: Godzilla and flying cyborg Jet Jaguar meet a giant cockroach and a big black chicken sent by Seatopians.

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: A teen (Brenton Thwaites) discovers the dark truth about his community's secret past from an old man (Jeff Bridges) who is the sole keeper of their world's memories.

programme.title: Immortals
programme.desc: A Greek stonemason named Theseus (Henry Cavill) revolts against a bloodthirsty king who wants to throw the gods out of Olympus and become master of the world.

programme.title: High Life
programme.desc: Monte and his baby daughter are the last survivors of a damned and dangerous mission to the outer reaches of the solar system. They must now rely on each other to survive as they hurtle toward the oblivion of a black hole.

programme.title: The Lobster
programme.desc: In a dystopian society, single people must find a mate within 45 days or be transformed into an animal of their choice.

programme.title: Bleed for This
programme.desc: With help from trainer Kevin Rooney (Aaron Eckhart), champion boxer Vinny Pazienza (Miles Teller) tries to make a comeback after breaking his neck in a car accident.

programme.title: Whose Streets?
programme.desc: An account of the Ferguson uprising as told by the people who lived it. The filmmakers look at how the killing of 18-year-old Michael Brown inspired a community to fight back and sparked a global movement.

programme.title: High-Rise
programme.desc: A doctor (Tom Hiddleston) moves into a London skyscraper where rising tensions and class warfare lead to anarchy.

programme.title: Shirley
programme.desc: A famous horror writer finds inspiration for her next book after she and her husband take in a young couple.

programme.title: The Hole in the Ground
programme.desc: One night, Sarah's young son disappears into the woods behind their rural home. When he returns, he looks the same, but his behavior grows increasingly disturbing. Sarah begins to believe that the boy who returned may not be her son at all.

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: A dope-smoking private detective (Joaquin Phoenix) navigates a psychedelic world of surfers, rockers, stoners, LAPD cops and more as he looks for a missing ex-girlfriend and her wealthy boyfriend.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: A sadistic Chicago lawman (Guy Pearce) comes to 1931 Virginia to shut down the Bondurant brothers' (Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, Jason Clarke) bootlegging business.

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple (Keri Russell, Josh Hamilton) and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.title: Killing Them Softly
programme.desc: After a rival crook hires a pair of bumbling thieves (Scoot McNairy, Ben Mendelsohn) to rob their card game, mobsters hire a reluctant hit man (Brad Pitt) to settle the score.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Hard-drinking country music star Jackson Maine discovers -- and falls in love with -- a struggling but talented singer named Ally. As her career quickly takes off, Jackson starts to realize that his best days may be behind him.

programme.title: Viva
programme.desc: A young hairdresser (Héctor Medina) clashes with his estranged father (Jorge Perugorría) when his dream of performing in drag comes true.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: 127 Hours
programme.desc: After his arm becomes pinned by a boulder in a remote canyon, mountaineer Aron Ralston (James Franco) must do the unthinkable in order to survive.

programme.title: Love Beats Rhymes
programme.desc: A young woman dream of making it big in the world of hip hop, but her parents demand that she finish college. She dutifully agrees to complete her education, however her spoken word proves to have a powerful impact in the classroom.

programme.title: The Tree of Life

programme.title: Funniest Pets and People
programme.desc: Un perro pasea como el audaz copiloto de este motociclista. Una pomerania gira como un tornado para rascarse la cola. Además, un chihuahua se relaja de una forma particular, junto a su dueño.

programme.title: Funniest Pets and People
programme.desc: Un espectáculo de patinaje sobre hielo se transforma en una coreografía de tropiezos y resbalones. Un perro se convierte en un campeón de salto olímpico al perseguir la luz de una linterna.

programme.title: Life's Funniest Moments
programme.desc: Dos niñas juegan a escapar de la divertida persecución de un ganso. Unos jóvenes se quedan atascados con una moto en un gran charco de lodo. Además, un bebé juega en el baño y deja un desastre.

programme.title: Life's Funniest Moments
programme.desc: Una mujer salta y grita con una alegría extraordinaria al recibir una sorpresa en Navidad. En una boda, los invitados no paran de reír por la sorprendente llegada de los novios a la fiesta.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.desc: María acusa a su pareja Sonia de haber asesinado al bebé que esperaban.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.desc: Celia renunció a su labor como trabajadora social para obtener la custodia de una niña cuyo caso incluía abuso sexual. Una viuda disfrutaba con su amante en un crucero mientras el cuerpo de su difunto esposa aun permanecía en la casa.

programme.title: Milagros de Navidad
programme.desc: Benjamín deja a su madre en vísperas de Navidad y viaja a ver a su padre. Cuando lo logra descubre una amarga verdad. Ahora valora el esfuerzo que su madre hizo para sacarlo adelante sola.

programme.title: Milagros de Navidad
programme.desc: Daniel tiene que trabajar durante la Navidad como enfermero de una adinerada mujer.

programme.title: Milagros de Navidad
programme.desc: El sueño de Lorena es entrar al Conservatorio de Música; por falta de recursos, sus padres temen apoyarla, su novio la alienta y su hermanito pide que se cumpla el sueño de su hermana.

programme.title: Feliz año, amor mío
programme.desc: Un violinista de fama internacional está desilusionado con su vida familiar y recibe una carta de una mujer desconocida.

programme.title: Dra. Lucía: Un don extraordinario
programme.desc: Frida entra a urgencias con un cuadro neurológico grave, Lucía usa su don y descubre una babosa. Mariana gracias a su romance con Enrique, se entera de que su misterioso paciente es Reséndiz.

programme.title: Escape perfecto
programme.desc: Viridiana y Demetrio compiten por un vehículo para la familia. Gerardo y su hijo llegan por influencia de una sobrina y pretenden ganarse todos los premios, además de un auto.

programme.title: Historias de la Virgen morena
programme.desc: La vida de Romina cambia cuando su esposo muere durante un asalto a su casa. Carlos, uno de los asaltantes, no puede superar la culpa y busca acercarse a ella.

programme.title: Acércate a Rocío
programme.desc: Laura tiene 20 años de casada. Su marido construyó un nido de amor para su amante, Gloria, en su propia casa y aunque no se han divorciado, él cree tener más derecho sobre la propiedad.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.desc: Se casaron, él la trajo a Miami y descubrió que estaba embarazada pero no de él. En otro caso, el hijo de Julia metió el miembro en un camping gas para que la novia le hiciera sexo oral.

programme.title: Bienvenido 2025
programme.desc: Un despliegue de talento y buena música para dar la bienvenida al nuevo año, con presentaciones en vivo de grandes estrellas que encenderán la fiesta en Nueva York, Puerto Rico, México y Miami.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.desc: Una familia se vuelve famosa con sus videos en internet, ahora Ivette se obsesionó y Pablo quiere pararlos.

programme.title: 12 corazones
programme.desc: En este episodio, los concursantes que van en busca del amor son un poco... extravagantes.

programme.title: 12 corazones
programme.desc: Estos participantes masculinos no se caracterizan por su belleza, pero el corazón quiere lo que el corazón quiere.

programme.title: 12 corazones
programme.desc: Penélope se pone en la piel de una maestra de escuela y pasa lista a los concursantes. Nadie puede llegar tarde a la clase sobre el amor.

programme.title: 12 corazones
programme.desc: El estudio se transforma en una juguetería: las participantes se disfrazan de muñecas y los concursantes se visten como peluches. ¿Encontrarán así el amor?

programme.title: Funniest Pets and People
programme.desc: Papa Noel cambia a su compañero de trineo por este canino que luce cuernos con cascabeles y una radiante nariz roja. Un gato lleva el estilo felino a otro nivel con una extravagante peluca.

programme.title: Funniest Pets and People
programme.desc: Un gato libra una dura pelea con el dedo de su dueño cubierto con una media que tiene un dibujo de una cara de enojo. Un perro sorprende por la forma que dribla y encesta una pelota de básquet.

programme.title: Life's Funniest Moments
programme.desc: El increíble resbalón de un joven que patina sobre hielo. Un ciclista sufre tremenda caída, tras un salto acrobático. Un bebé trata de mantener el equilibrio cuando está en el borde de la cama.

programme.title: Life's Funniest Moments
programme.desc: En plena ceremonia matrimonial, un hombre tira una moneda al aire cuando le preguntan si acepta a su novia como esposa. Un niño olvida su discurso en un acto y resuelve de una forma graciosa.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.desc: Paola le pide el divorcio a Sebastián porque no soporta su falta de higiene. Angélica se aterra porque su hijo adolescente tiene contacto con su padre gay, y teme que el joven se vuelva homosexual.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.desc: Un profesor abusó sexualmente de una de sus alumnas y, al salir de prisión, inició una relación amorosa con ella. Ramiro engorda a su hijo para convertirlo en luchador de sumo, pero su esposa se opone.

programme.title: Milagros de Navidad
programme.desc: Karen agrede a su jefe después de que él intentara violarla. Al ser detenida por la policía, se inicia su proceso de deportación. La madre de Karen llega a EE. UU. e intenta impedirlo.

programme.title: Milagros de Navidad
programme.desc: Juana da albergue a 40 perros abandonados por sus dueños deportados. En plena Navidad, sus vecinos y su casero le exigen dejar la casa. Solo un milagro puede ayudarla a hallar un nuevo refugio.

programme.title: Decade of Dominance
programme.desc: A commemorative look at the 10-year anniversary of the College Football Playoff that highlights the SEC's success across the last decade. During that time, the SEC earned 12 CFP appearances and six National Championships -- the most of any league.

programme.title: Giant Killers: The Story of the Lady Longhorns
programme.desc: The story of Title IX's impact on the University of Texas, with a spotlight on its first director of women's athletics, Donna Lopiano; driven by the spirit of Title IX, Lopiano's legacy has paved the way for female athletes in Austin and beyond.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Hawkeyes (8-4) take on the No. 19 Tigers (9-3) in the Music City Bowl. Iowa defeated Missouri 27-24 in the 2010 Insight Bowl, the first meeting between schools in 100 years. The Hawkeyes are 10-10 in bowl games under head coach Kirk Ferentz.

programme.title: Southern Hoops: A History of SEC Basketball
programme.desc: Georgia's Dominique Wilkins and Auburn's Charles Barkley headline the SEC's successes in the early 1980s, while LSU's Dale Brown takes two teams to the Final Four. Pat Summitt wins her first two national titles at Tennessee.

programme.title: Southern Hoops: A History of SEC Basketball
programme.desc: Arkansas joins the SEC and becomes one of the conference's top teams, led by fiery coach Nolan Richardson and his "40 Minutes of Hell" attack. Kentucky returns to prominence, and at Tennessee, Pat Summitt wins three straight NCAA titles.

programme.title: Southern Hoops: A History of SEC Basketball
programme.desc: In his first year at Kentucky, Tubby Smith becomes the third Black coach ever to win a national title. Florida's back-to-back NCAA crowns mark the rise of a new power. The Lady Vols win 2 straight NCAA titles as LSU reaches 5 straight Final Fours.

programme.title: Southern Hoops: A History of SEC Basketball
programme.desc: John Calipari continues the winning tradition at Kentucky with a national championship in 2012. Four years later, Pat Summitt passes away after battling early-onset Alzheimer's disease. Dawn Staley leads South Carolina to a pair of NCAA titles.

programme.desc: In 1986, federal agent Robert Mazur (Bryan Cranston) poses as a money-laundering businessman to infiltrate the trafficking network of Colombian drug kingpin Pablo Escobar.

programme.desc: An Allied officer (Brad Pitt) and his team of Jewish soldiers join forces with a German actress and undercover agent to take down the leaders of the Third Reich.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A master thief (Mark Wahlberg) and his crew plan to steal back a fortune in gold bullion after they lose it to a double-crossing gang member (Edward Norton).

programme.title: All the World Is Sleeping
programme.desc: A young mother in New Mexico sinks deeper into addiction while struggling to care for her daughter.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: After an ambitious manager (Jamie Foxx) gives them a shot at stardom, three singers learn that fame can carry a high personal cost.

programme.title: Mafia Mamma
programme.desc: A mild-mannered suburban mom unexpectedly inherits her late grandfather's mafia empire in Italy. Guided by the firm's trusted consigliere, she hilariously defies everyone's expectations as she finds herself stuck in the middle of a deadly mob war.

programme.title: North of Normal
programme.desc: Raised in the wilderness, Cea Sunrise Person navigates a complicated relationship with her pot-smoking mother while seeking some semblance of normalcy.

programme.title: Together Together
programme.desc: A young loner becomes a surrogate mother for a single, middle-aged man who wants a child. Their unexpected relationship soon challenges their perceptions of connection, boundaries and the particulars of love.

programme.title: The Whale
programme.desc: A reclusive English teacher, living alone in the wake of a tragedy, attempts to reconnect with his teenage daughter for one last chance at redemption.

programme.title: Past Lives
programme.desc: Nora and Hae Sung, two deeply connected childhood friends, are wrest apart after Nora's family emigrates from South Korea. Decades later, they are reunited for one fateful week as they confront destiny, love and the choices that make a life.

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: An impossible love blooms across two time periods and continents.

programme.title: Wild Things
programme.desc: A Florida police officer investigates when two teens accuse a high-school guidance counselor of rape.

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby
programme.desc: A pregnant woman's (Mia Farrow) husband (John Cassavetes) and their satanic neighbors want her baby to be the Antichrist.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: A man (Matthew Broderick) and his wife (Nicole Kidman) move to a quaint suburb where most of the women seem to have the same bland personality.

programme.title: You Hurt My Feelings
programme.desc: A novelist's long-standing marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband give his honest reaction to her latest book.

programme.title: My One and Only
programme.desc: A woman (Renée Zellweger) leaves her philandering husband and begins a cross-country search for a wealthy mate who can bankroll a better life for her and her sons.

programme.title: Clouds of Sils Maria
programme.desc: A veteran actress (Juliette Binoche) comes face-to-face with an uncomfortable reflection of herself when she agrees to take part in a revival of the play that launched her career 20 years earlier.

programme.title: Frozen River
programme.desc: The lure of easy money leads a financially strapped mother (Melissa Leo) to join a Mohawk woman (Misty Upham) in smuggling illegal immigrants from Canada to the U.S.

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: Men reminisce about intriguing sisters, whose parents (James Woods, Kathleen Turner) quarantined them after one of the five killed herself.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father's last request forces four grown siblings to live together for a week under one roof, they confront their turbulent history and tattered relationships.

programme.title: Love Story
programme.desc: An old-money Harvard man Oliver (Ryan O'Neal) woos and weds a no-money music student (Ali MacGraw) from the wrong side of the tracks.

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: A society girl abandons her haughty fiance for a penniless artist on the ill-fated ship's maiden voyage.

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: A slain Manhattan yuppie (Patrick Swayze) reaches out to his lover (Demi Moore), with a medium (Whoopi Goldberg) as his middlewoman.

programme.title: Clouds of Sils Maria
programme.desc: A veteran actress (Juliette Binoche) comes face-to-face with an uncomfortable reflection of herself when she agrees to take part in a revival of the play that launched her career 20 years earlier.

programme.title: Detained
programme.desc: A woman wakes up in a police interrogation room with no memory of the night prior. Something does not seem quite right in this police station.

programme.title: You Hurt My Feelings
programme.desc: A novelist's long-standing marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband give his honest reaction to her latest book.

programme.title: Spotlights: A Showtime Short Film Series
programme.desc: An American teenager visits her family in Jamaica and learns a secret that changes the way she sees the people she loves.

programme.title: An Acceptable Loss
programme.desc: Haunted by what she knows, a former national security adviser risks her life to expose a massive cover-up involving thousands of deaths.

programme.title: Emily
programme.desc: Emily Brontë struggles within the confines of her life, yearning for artistic and personal freedom. She finds romance before writing her seminal novel, "Wuthering Heights.".

programme.title: Kelly & Cal
programme.desc: An unhappy new mother (Juliette Lewis) banishes the blues through her friendship with a mischievous teen (Jonny Weston) who has a spinal injury.

programme.title: Pirates
programme.desc: On New Year's Eve 1999, three best mates set out on a road trip journey across London in a desperate search for tickets for the best millennium party ever.

programme.title: Fist Fight
programme.desc: Fired from his teaching job for losing his cool, a disgruntled man (Ice Cube) challenges the colleague (Charlie Day) who snitched on him to a fight after school.

programme.title: Outlaw Posse
programme.desc: In 1908 an outlaw returns from years of hiding in Mexico to claim stolen gold hidden in the hills of Montana.

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks drive to a secluded cafe for a big score.

programme.title: Heist 88
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind decides to pull one last job before going to prison and recruits a group of young bank employees to steal millions in a daring and brazen assault on the U.S. banking system.

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: Following the journey of Vanessa, a grief-stricken woman who mysteriously finds herself navigating between parallel spaces.

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: Maya and her young daughter are forced to live underground when Earth is left uninhabitable due to a lack of oxygen. They soon find themselves in a fight for survival when a mysterious couple arrive and claim to know the fate of Maya's husband.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Benjamin Button (Brad Pitt) is born an old man in 1918 New Orleans and ages in reverse and, in so doing, becomes intimately familiar with the natures of love and death.

programme.title: The Birth of a Black Movie Hero: Sweet Sweetback
programme.desc: The low-budget film, "Sweet Sweetback's Song," opens in a 1971 Detroit cinema and strikes a liberating blow for a whole generation of young African-American women and men.

programme.title: Stand

programme.title: Nana's Boys
programme.desc: The intimate life of a couple who are confronted with the fact that their relationship is not as solid as they thought.

programme.title: Unaccompanied Minors
programme.desc: After a Christmas Eve blizzard shuts down the airport, stranded youths create holiday pandemonium for an uptight airport official (Lewis Black) and his assistant (Wilmer Valderrama).

programme.title: The Ladies Man
programme.desc: A late-night radio host and self-described Casanova (Tim Meadows) searches for a lost love when he receives an unsigned letter boasting of her wealth.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: After an ambitious manager (Jamie Foxx) gives them a shot at stardom, three singers learn that fame can carry a high personal cost.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral
programme.desc: Sibling rivalry, family secrets and a mysterious stranger threaten to blow the lid off the coffin when a man tries to give his late father a proper memorial.

programme.title: Scary Movie 2
programme.desc: Psychology students and their professor spend the weekend in a haunted house in this sendup of horror films.

programme.title: Scary Movie 3
programme.desc: After Cindy (Anna Faris) accidentally watches a strange videotape that causes the viewer to die within a week, she discovers the tape is only one of many weird happenings.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations
programme.desc: To collect his aunt's inheritance, an unemployed man (Cuba Gooding Jr.) must form a gospel choir and lead it to success.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A hip Detroit detective (Eddie Murphy) drives out to Los Angeles and shows local police (Judge Reinhold, John Ashton) how to catch a killer.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: A clever detective (Eddie Murphy) from Detroit shows Los Angeles how to stop a hit woman's (Brigitte Nielsen) so-called Alphabet Crimes.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: A hip detective (Eddie Murphy) from Detroit tracks a crime ring to a Los Angeles fun park called WonderWorld.

programme.title: Harlem Nights
programme.desc: Business partners (Eddie Murphy, Richard Pryor) sting a white mobster trying to take over their nightclub in 1930s Harlem.

programme.title: Luce
programme.desc: A liberal-minded couple are forced to reconsider their image of their adopted son after he writes a disturbing essay for a class assignment.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: About 45,000 years ago, a desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in. As they start to realize that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: The Aggressives
programme.desc: Filmmaker Daniel Peddle follows a group of masculine-presenting queer people of color who were assigned female at birth. They don't always feel included or represented by the LGBTQ world.

programme.title: Basketball County: In the Water
programme.desc: Star athletes, local legends, historians, and experts chronicle the evolution of the game and examine why Prince George's County, Md., produces more professional basketball players than anywhere else in the world.

programme.title: Mary Lou Williams: The Lady Who Swings the Band

programme.title: Loudmouth

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: A Manhattan playboy (Eddie Murphy) gets a new corporate boss (Robin Givens), and she treats him the way he has always treated women.

programme.title: The Pacific War in Color
programme.desc: Allies slug it out on the island of Peleliu in a campaign to pave the way for Gen. MacArthur's return to the Philippines; footage shows troops enduring the muddy muck in the Philippines; Japan unveils a devastating new tactic, the kamikaze.

programme.desc: President Harry Truman decides to drop the atomic bomb on Hiroshima and Nagasaki; Emperor Hirohito surrenders, and Gen. Douglas MacArthur arrives to oversee the country's occupation; mortal enemies must now become partners in Japan's rebirth.

programme.desc: Months after the Pearl Harbor attack, shock waves reverberate in every corner of the Pacific; Americans deploy to stem the enemy's advance; after culture clashes, Allied forces later bond over efforts to thwart Japan's move to control New Guinea.

programme.desc: In 1943, the United States engages in a new series of island-hopping invasions; the first stop is the Tarawa Atoll, where troops embark upon the largest amphibious invasion ever staged in the Pacific to fight one of the costliest battles of the war.

programme.desc: Allied forces move to take the valuable islands of Tinian and Guam that threaten American air operations; meanwhile, Gen. Curtis LeMay is tasked with planning and executing a fire bombing campaign against Japan.

programme.title: Champions (2023)
programme.desc: Contending with misdemeanor charges, disgraced minor league basketball coach Marcus receives orders from the court to take a team of players with intellectual disabilities under his wing. Longing for the skills of his former team, Marcus initially struggles to connect with his new team, given the variety of challenges their diagnoses present. Yet the athletes' continued perseverance against the odds inspires Marcus to change his ways, in turn helping the team reach new heights.

programme.title: The Spore (2021)
programme.desc: The lives of ten individuals come to a grave intersection as a deadly mutating fungus makes its way into a small town, destroying various living organisms and killing everyone that comes across its path.

programme.desc: Mrs. Harris, an English domestic servant who falls in love with a couture Dior dress, decides she must buy one of her own. After she raises the funds to buy the dress, Mrs. Harris sets off on a journey to Paris that will change the course of her life. Paul Gallico's classic 1958 novel inspires the narrative.

programme.title: Of an Age (2023)
programme.desc: Kol, a Serbian dancer, goes to help his dance partner Ebony and comes away with much more. When Ebony wakes up on a beach with no recollection of how she got there, Kol rushes to her side. In the process, he meets Adam, Ebony's older brother. The two have a 24-hour romance, ending when Adam has to leave. But their brief relationship means so much to both of them that neither distance nor the future can keep them apart.

programme.title: The Unholy (2021)
programme.desc: Alice is young hearing-impaired girl who, after a supposed visitation from the Virgin Mary, is inexplicably able to hear, speak and heal the sick. As word spreads and people from near and far flock to witness her miracles, a disgraced journalist hoping to revive his career visits the small New England town to investigate. When terrifying events begin to happen all around, he starts to question if these phenomena are the works of the Virgin Mary or something much more sinister.

programme.desc: Phoebe tries to turn herself into a bad girl to impress Max's new best friend, a rocker who is in Max's new band.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max head out on a trip to the mall to buy Hank's birthday gift and end up having a run-in with security.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Max tries to win an epic-fail video contest by submitting a video of Phoebe as she practices ballet, but Phoebe refuses to cooperate.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: A vigilante in a smiley-face mask punishes Swellviewians for being rude in public; Kid Danger and Captain Man's investigation leads them to the TV set of Mr. Wallabee, a local TV celebrity who hosts a show for children.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry and the other kids destroy Ray's prized movie prop, The Theranos Boot; to replace it, Henry and Jasper travel to an alternate universe Man Cave using Bill Evil's interdimensional transporter and steal their Theranos Boot before Ray finds out.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Sick of fighting the same old villains, Captain Man makes a profile on a matchmaking app for heroes and villains; Kid Danger agrees to do the same, and two of them set up a double-fight to square off with some new villains.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry and the gang set up a secret underground restaurant in the Man Cave for Charlotte's private dinner with music superstar Jack Swagger; when word gets out that Jack Swagger is in town, some unwanted guests crash the party.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When a young girl chains herself outside of Junk-N-Stuff, Kid Danger and Captain Man are forced to help find her beloved phone; while on a stakeout, they unexpectedly run across some familiar faces with a devious plan.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Kid Danger and Captain Man enter an escape room by a factory owner with a "chip" on his shoulder, and become trapped inside with two new kids, Mika and Miles, who are oddly good at solving the puzzles they need to answer to get out.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Kid Danger reveals to Captain Man that he doesn't want to be stuck in Swellview and be his sidekick forever; to make matters worse, Kid Danger is recruited by another town to be their hero.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Captain Man's old sidekick and nemesis, Drex, returns from the past with an army of cavemen to finish off Captain Man once and for all; Kid Danger may be the only one who can save Captain Man.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: As Henry tries to adjust to his new role as Kid Danger, he struggles to balance his schedule between crime-fighting, school and family.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry's life as Kid Danger is threatened when Charlotte grows suspicious about the secrets he has been keeping.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Captain Man loses his powers of invulnerability and becomes too afraid to fight crime, Kid Danger must keep Swellview safe.

programme.title: Guys and Dolls (1955)
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Broadway smash about a gambler trying to finance the "Oldest Established Permanent Floating Crap Game in New York" by betting another gambler that he can't score a date with a virginal mission worker. What are the odds that the two just might fall in love?

programme.title: Ocean's 11 (1960)
programme.desc: Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin, Sammy Davis Jr. and the rest of the Rat Pack do it their way in the classic original version of the caper flick. Ol' Blue Eyes is Danny Ocean, a playboy who rounds up his old army buddies for a military-style heist in Vegas. The plan: Ring-a-ding in the New Year with a rip off of five casinos. Peter Lawford, Angie Dickinson, Richard Conte.

programme.title: Palm Springs Weekend (1963)
programme.desc: College students romp during Easter vacation at the resort, where one young man falls for a local lovely unaware that she's the daughter of the police chief. The screenplay was written by Earl Hamner Jr., who went onto create TV's "The Waltons.".

programme.title: The Last of Sheila (1973)
programme.desc: A filmmaker invites six movie-business types on a weeklong yacht voyage on the Mediterranean, where they engage in a role-playing game that turns murderous.

programme.title: The Rules of the Game (1939)
programme.desc: Pre-World War II French social issues are explored, as a group of aristocratic friends gather at an estate for a party. When a man turns up murdered, three overlapping love triangles between the nobles and their servants are revealed.

programme.title: Ten Little Indians (1965)
programme.desc: Ten people are lured to a dinner party at a ski resort where the disembodied voice of their host relates that they all must be punished for past wrongs.

programme.title: House on Haunted Hill (1959)
programme.desc: An eccentric millionaire challenges several strangers to spend the night in an allegedly haunted house, offering to award $10,000 to all who complete the task.

programme.title: The Exterminating Angel (1962)
programme.desc: Luis Bunuel's allegory of the privileged class, about a group of friends trapped at a dinner party by their own inertia. Jacqueline Andere. Leandro: Jose Baviera. The Walkyrie: Silvia Pinal. Doctor: Augusto Benedico. Russell: Antonio Bravo. Cristian: Luis Beristain. Majordomo: Claudio Brook.

programme.title: Judex (1963)
programme.desc: Science fiction blends with comic-strip adventure in this homage to the days of silent serials. Channing Pollock, Sylva Koscina. Jacqueline: Edith Scob. Diana: Francine Berge. Favraux: Michel Vitold. Morales: Theo Sarapo. Kerjean: Rene Genin.

programme.title: The Thin Man (1934)
programme.desc: First and best of the famous whodunit series has the wisecracking, martini-sipping husband-and-wife sleuthing team of Nick and Nora Charles investigating the disappearance of an inventor who later is implicated in the murder of his secretary. The film, an adaptation of a Dashiell Hammett private-eye classic, was followed by five sequels. Incidentally, "The Thin Man" refers to the inventor, not Nick Charles.

programme.title: After the Thin Man (1936)
programme.desc: The second entry in the comedy-whodunit series finds married sleuths Nick and Nora Charles in San Francisco, where they get involved in a murder case in which her lovely cousin is a suspect. The screenplay by Albert Hackett and Frances Goodrich was nominated for an Oscar.

programme.title: Another Thin Man (1939)
programme.desc: Sleuthing couple Nick and Nora Charles are called in -- with their dog Asta and a new baby -- to help investigate the case of an explosives manufacturer who is sure a shady character is out to get him. Look for Shemp Howard, of the Three Stooges, in a small role.

programme.title: Shadow of the Thin Man (1941)
programme.desc: A private detective comes out of retirement and, with his wife, solves a murder at the local horse race track.

programme.title: The Thin Man Goes Home (1944)
programme.desc: In the fifth entry of "The Thin Man" series, Nick and Nora Charles visit his parents in his old hometown, where they get involved in international intrigue while investigating the murder of a local.

programme.title: Song of the Thin Man (1947)
programme.desc: Sixth and final entry in the series about husband-and-wife sleuths Nick and Nora Charles has the duo investigating the murder of a bandleader aboard a gambling ship.

programme.title: The Apartment (1960)
programme.desc: An office worker loans his tiny New York City flat to his superiors for their secret romantic trysts and is subsequently promoted for maintaining silence about the affairs, but he runs into trouble when he gets involved with his callous boss's girlfriend.

programme.title: Bundle of Joy (1956)
programme.desc: Musical remake of the 1939 comedy "Bachelor Mother" is about a department-store salesgirl whose life is turned upside-down when she finds an abandoned infant, and despite her protestations and denials, many assume she's the child's actual mother. Stars Eddie Fisher and Debbie Reynolds were married at the time.

programme.title: Repeat Performance (1947)
programme.desc: Joan Leslie as a murderess who gets a chance to relive the last year. Louis Hayward, Richard Basehart (film debut), Virginia Field, Tom Conway. Alfred Werker directed.

programme.title: Trading Places (1983)
programme.desc: Funny business about a snobby, wealthy investment broker unwittingly switching roles with a fast-talking street hustler as part of a whimsical wager orchestrated by two billionaire brothers, and then teaming up to exact revenge on the tycoons.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard (1950)
programme.desc: An ageing silent-film star who has faded into Hollywood obscurity enlists a down-on-his-luck, opportunistic young screenwriter to aid her comeback, but her maniacal ego turns the challenge into an uphill battle.

programme.desc: Electrifying concert documentary of the Monterey International Pop Festival, held in June 1967. Performers include Jimi Hendrix, Ravi Shankar, Janis Joplin and Big Brother & the Holding Company, the Mamas & the Papas, Jefferson Airplane and the Who.

programme.title: Esta historia me suena
programme.desc: Una mujer salva a una chica de ser secuestrada y la contrata en su casa para ser la profesora de su hijo, sin saber que su esposo le será infiel con ella. El hijo de la mujer descubre que la chica oculta un secreto que puede poner en peligro su vida.

programme.title: Clase 406
programme.desc: Leonardo logra escapar de la policía y se encuentra desesperado ante la situación que se le está presentando. El papá de Charly lo busca y le dice que lo acepta como es y que puede regresar a casa.

programme.title: La Gata
programme.desc: El Tilico le habla a Esmeralda para decirle que tiene a la Jarocha secuestrada y amenaza con matarla si no le da el dinero que le pide. Lorenza se entera que Gisella fue quien le disparó a Pablo.

programme.title: Como dice el dicho
programme.desc: Tamara es una chica extrovertida que busca cualquier oportunidad para aprovecharse de su amiga Paola. Sin embargo, Rosario, la madre de Paola, intenta ayudar a su hija a no sufrir los abusos de Tamara.

programme.title: Como dice el dicho
programme.desc: Jessica y Diana son hermanas, pero Jessica es muy rebelde y Diana es más aplicada. No obstante, la rivalidad entre ambas está muy marcada.

programme.title: Corona de lágrimas
programme.desc: Cuando Refugio y sus tres hijos, Patricio, Edmundo e Ignacio son echados de su hogar, por obra del destino llegan a la Ciudad de México, donde inician una nueva vida.

programme.title: Muchacha italiana viene a casarse
programme.desc: El papá de Fiorella le escribe a su amigo Vittorio, quien está en México, para no dejar desamparadas a sus hijas cuando el falte ya que está muy enfermo. Fiorella y Pedro se conocen en Italia inesperadamente.

programme.title: Como tú no hay dos
programme.desc: Damián se disculpa con Fabiana y le regala un anillo para demostrarle que sus intenciones son buenas. Oriana le dice a Valeria que su padre le dará el divorcio si ella se muda con él a Europa.

programme.title: El Chavo
programme.desc: Don Ramón no tiene dinero para pagar la renta y le pide al Chavo que le avise cuando el señor Barriga llegue a la vecindad diciendo que llegaron los platillos voladores.

programme.title: El Chavo
programme.desc: Doña Florinda le prohíbe a Quico salir a jugar, él muy enojado patea una pelota y golpea a la Chilindrina. Don Ramón consigue trabajo como ropavejero. Doña Florinda le dice a Quico que si se porta mal el ropavejero se lo llevará.
